name: The Killer (344Games)
description:
The police have recently gotten a lead on the hideout of a notorious serial killer. You, a police detective, go to the hideout ahead of time to seek out incriminating evidence.

NOTE: This game is a work in progress and will be finished at a later date. Later additions will include weather effects, sound effects and a 3D character model. If you have any recommendations for other features, please leave a comment describing and I'll take them into consideration. I also ask if you inform me of anything that can be improved upon.
